name: Retro Games!
description:
Three retro arcade games, old school challenge and fun!

Remember when games were all about fast reflexes, simple mechanics, and endless hours of replayability? Retro Games! does, and it's got three times the fun packed into a single download, complete with global high scores and all the nostalgic arcade fun you could ever want.

Retro Games! comes with the following titles available from a single menu:

Bricks Demolition
Destroy the bricks in 48 levels of intense arcade action. Slide the paddle back and forth as you try to keep the bouncing ball on the screen. Collect power-ups to change your paddle's size or activate abilities like multi-ball. If you're clever enough, you might just uncover a few secret stages!

Bombs!
When your airplane runs out of fuel over an enemy city, there's only one thing left to do: clear a path for a safe landing! Drop bombs on the bad guys' buildings with each flyby, knocking them to the ground before you crash and burn. Be fast and be accurate, otherwise it's game over!

Snaky
Hungry lil' snake, aren't ya? Move around the screen as you chomp on food to grow big and strong. The longer you get, the more difficult it is to move, as you can't exactly eat your own tail! Avoid crashing into the walls and see how large you can grow!


Features:
Three retro arcade games: Bricks Demolition, Bombs!, and Snaky
Game Center support with global high score board
Instant save and resume feature so you never lose progress
old console style LCD graphics
8-bit sound effects and music
Stylish console interface
Change the console's colors to suit your mood
